ingredients.ingredient: 5 pounds russet potatoes, peeled and diced
1 (32 ounce) carton Swanson® Unsalted Chicken Stock
¼ cup low-sodium dry ranch dressing mix
¾ cup shredded nonfat Cheddar cheese

cookingTips: Use chicken stock instead of water for richer flavor in mashed potatoes
Keep sour cream and cheese at room temperature before mixing to avoid clumping
Fold in ingredients gently after mashing to maintain light, fluffy texture
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This lighter version of loaded mashed potatoes maintains flavor while being more wholesome. How would you garnish it for visual appeal?
